title: The Secret of the Twintails
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>....What’s with you? Why are you staring at me like that, Ayumu? Well, Nico can understand how you would be fascinated by me, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>S-, sorry. I was just thinking how cute your twintails look, Nico-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Ah, speaking of which, I haven’t told you the secret to this weapon I call twintails yet, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeeh!? There’s a secret to that too!? I guess the secrets you told me the other day were only part of them all....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s right. Nico is a school idol of many secrets! But, before I tell you, would you let me hear what you think about my twintails?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Sure. Ruby-chan, Emma-san, and Lanzhu-chan also have twintails, but I think there’s something different about yours. I believe that your kind of twintails is perfect for an active, energetic, and cute girl like you, Nico-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh.... I guess you do understand! As expected of someone who has learned some of my secrets.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Really? Ehehe, I’m happy to hear that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Come here. I’ll style your hair into twintails too, Ayumu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeeeeh!? I-, I’m not ready for that yet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It’s fine, it’s fine. I’ll share this one secret with you, alright♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
